body.p: FBReader is an e-book reader, it supports ePub and fb2 file formats. Put the books you want to read into 'Documents' or 'Downloads' folder in your phone memory. After that you'll find those books in your Library.

To turn a page you need to tap the right side of the screen (left side if you want to turn a page back). There are also other options: you can turn pages by swiping screen from right to left or use hardware volume keys.
Preferences Dialog allows you to customize FBReader to suit your reading habits: choose colors, fonts, library options, page turning options, etc.
